title: Contemporary China Stay in the Heart of Tangshan Near South Lake
description: Take a step into the rich cultural history of Tangshan with a city escape to InterContinental Tangshan, an IHG Hotel. Wander through Dazhao Park and Tangshan Seismic Memorial to the scenic South Lake, or stumble on cultural highlights including Chinese Ping Opera, shadow play and Laoting drums. Savour Western delights at Phoenix All-Day Dining, traditional Chinese dishes at Tang Yuan or laze by the onsite indoor pool.
offer_address: No.11 Wenhua Road, Lunan District, Tangshan, 063000, China
